title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.19 - Policies concerning course cancellation and tuition refund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.19 - Policies concerning course cancellation and tuition refund

State Regulations

An educational institution or other organization, which
requests approval for courses from the Department of State, must have a policy
relating to course cancellation and tuition refunds. A copy of that policy must
be provided, in writing, to prospective students prior to the acceptance of any
fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1107.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
